text: Giampiero Galeazzi (18 May 1946 – 12 November 2021) was an Italian competition rower, sport journalist, commentator, and television personality. He was born in Rome, Italy. He was known for hosting 90° minuto and Domenica in. He also worked as a journalist at RAI. Galeazzi died on 12 November 2021 in Rome from problems caused by diabetes at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian journalists Category:Sports commentators Category:Italian television personalities Category:Sportspeople from Rome Category:Writers from Rome Category:Italian rowers
title: Giampiero Galeazzi
